Credit: Illustration by ArLuther Lee

With MARTA off the ballot, will two metro Atlanta counties finally vote to expand public transit?

For almost 60 years, voters in Gwinnett and Cobb have voted against penny-sales tax for public transit expansion. That could change this November with MARTA off the ballot.
